member.name: M:Moon.IO.DirectoryInfoExtensions.CopyTo(System.IO.DirectoryInfo,System.String)
member.summary: Copies an existing directory to a new destination, disallowing the overwriting of existing files.
member.param: The name and path to which to copy this directory. The destination cannot be another disk volume.

member.name: M:Moon.IO.DirectoryInfoExtensions.CopyTo(System.IO.DirectoryInfo,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Copies an existing directory to a new destination, allowing the overwriting of existing files.
member.param: The name and path to which to copy this directory. The destination cannot be another disk volume.
true to allow an existing file to be overwritten; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Moon.IO.DirectoryInfoExtensions.DeleteIfExists(System.IO.DirectoryInfo,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Deletes the folder if it exists.
member.param: true to delete this directory, its subdirectories, and all files; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Moon.IO.DirectoryInfoExtensions.Subdirectory(System.IO.DirectoryInfo,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a subdirectory on the specified path.

member.name: M:Moon.IO.FileInfoExtensions.Create(System.IO.FileInfo,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a file and optionally a directory.
member.param: Indicates whether to create a directory as well.
